mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shangjia_id as shangjiaId ,a.meishi_name as meishiName ,a.meishi_uuid_number as meishiUuidNumber ,a.meishi_photo as meishiPhoto ,a.zan_number as zanNumber ,a.cai_number as caiNumber ,a.meishi_types as meishiTypes ,a.meishi_kucun_number as meishiKucunNumber ,a.meishi_old_money as meishiOldMoney ,a.meishi_new_money as meishiNewMoney ,a.meishi_clicknum as meishiClicknum ,a.meishi_content as meishiContent ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.meishi_delete as meishiDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
